description: An immersive PUBG Mobile event introducing elemental powers, floating islands, and exclusive rewards.

elemental_powers.description: Players can master unique elemental arts by selecting one of four abilities on Spawn Island.

abilities.effect: Unleashes powerful offensive fire attacks, dealing continuous burn damage to enemies.

where_to_select.en: Chosen on Spawn Island before the match starts.

usage.en: Best used in aggressive combat situations to deal high damage over time.

tips.en: Pair with explosive weapons like grenades or Molotovs for area denial.
Use it in confined spaces to maximize damage output.
Target groups of enemies to spread burn damage efficiently.

abilities.effect: Creates defensive water barriers that absorb enemy fire and reduce incoming damage.

where_to_select.en: Chosen on Spawn Island before the match starts.

usage.en: Use when engaging in mid-range fights to shield against enemy fire.

tips.en: Combine with healing items to maximize durability in fights.
Deploy barriers before reviving teammates to reduce vulnerability.
Use in open areas to block sniper shots and create temporary cover.

abilities.effect: Enhances movement speed with wind energy, allowing rapid repositioning.

where_to_select.en: Chosen on Spawn Island before the match starts.

usage.en: Useful for quick rotations, escaping enemies, or flanking opponents.

tips.en: Activate before rushing enemies to gain a positioning advantage.
Use it to quickly reposition after taking a sniper shot.
Ideal for escaping the blue zone or rotating into the final circles.

abilities.effect: Grants summoning and teleportation abilities for rapid repositioning.

where_to_select.en: Chosen on Spawn Island before the match starts.

usage.en: Best for repositioning, surprise attacks, or quick escapes.

tips.en: Teleport to high ground for better sniping opportunities.
Use teleportation to flank enemies during team fights.
Escape from heavy crossfire by instantly relocating.

description.en: Key battlegrounds in the Sacred Quartet event, each offering unique challenges, loot, and strategic advantages.
A massive floating fortress at the mountain’s peak, offering high-tier loot, strategic high-ground advantages, and intense battles.

access_method.en: Players can reach the sect by approaching the mountain’s base, triggering an automatic lift to the top.

strategic_value.en: Provides superior positioning for long-range engagements.

tips.en: Expect intense fights early in the game due to high-tier loot.
Utilize elemental devices for mobility and combat advantages.

description.en: Previously a sacred training ground, this area contains elemental trials and teleportation gateways to the Four Guardians Sect.

elemental_trials.en: Mini-challenges granting powerful buffs and loot upon completion.

secret_treasures.en: Environmental puzzles leading to hidden rewards.

spirit_gates.en: Teleporters that instantly transport players to the Four Guardians Sect.

tips.en: Complete trials early for buffs that provide an advantage in combat.
Use Spirit Gates for rapid repositioning to gain high ground.

description.en: A collection of mystical locations offering hidden loot, teleportation mechanics, and unique rewards.

effect.en: Transports players to the Mystic Enclave, a secret loot-filled location.

return_mechanic.en: Players return to their original location after collecting items.

special_interaction.en: Players can interact with pandas to unlock exclusive rewards.

panda_vehicle.en: A two-seater transport with rolling capabilities for fast movement and extra defense.

tips.en: Use Mystic Scrolls to teleport between safe zones while securing loot.
Interact with pandas for hidden bonuses and the Panda Vehicle.

exclusive_rewards.description: Special rewards and collectibles for participating in the event.

items.name: Two-Seater Panda Mount
items.description: Feed resting pandas in serene bamboo forests to earn this exclusive mount.
items.tip: Find pandas in isolated jungle areas to avoid enemy encounters.

items.name: Dumpling Healing Items
items.tip: Keep dumplings for late-game battles to survive longer.

items.name: Year of the Snake Fireworks
items.description: Trigger spectacular firework displays in the main Sacred Quartet area.
items.tip: Use fireworks as a distraction to lure enemies out of hiding.

items.name: Lion Dance Activation
items.description: Experience vibrant performances in the Mystic Enclave.
items.tip: Use the dance as a cover while teammates move undetected.

general_tips.tip: Choose the right elemental power based on your playstyle.
general_tips.explanation: Fire is best for aggressive players, Water for defense, Wind for mobility, and Nature for tactical play.

general_tips.tip: Master the Floating Islands' jump mechanics.
general_tips.explanation: Use geysers and jump pads to quickly move across the map.
Higher terrain gives a better view of enemies and reduces the chance of getting ambushed.
Fire Stones, water barriers, and wind tunnels can be used strategically against enemies.

general_tips.tip: Save Mystic Scrolls for critical moments.
general_tips.explanation: Teleportation can be the difference between victory and defeat, so use scrolls wisely.
